TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator

summary.span: 对输入控件执行用户定义的验证。

span.span: Performs user-defined validation on an input control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件为输入控件提供用户定义的验证函数。Use the control to provide a user-defined validation function for an input control. 控件是一个独立于它所验证的输入控件的控件，它允许您控制验证消息的显示位置。The control is a separate control from the input control it validates, which allows you to control where the validation message is displayed. 验证控件始终在服务器上执行验证。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 它们还具有完整的客户端实现，该实现允许启用脚本的浏览器 (例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本) 在客户端上执行验证。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证通过在将用户输入发送到服务器之前检查用户输入来增强验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这允许在提交窗体前在客户端上检测到错误，从而避免了服务器端验证所需的信息的往返过程。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, thus avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 若要创建服务器端验证函数，请提供执行验证的事件的处理程序 。To create a server-side validation function, provide a handler for the event that performs the validation. 可以通过使用 作为参数传递到事件处理程序中的对象的属性来访问要验证的输入控件中的字符串。The string from the input control to validate can be accessed by using the property of the object passed into the event handler as a parameter. 然后，验证的结果存储在 对象的属性中 。The result of the validation is then stored in the property of the object. 若要创建客户端验证函数，请首先添加前面介绍的服务器端验证函数。To create a client-side validation function, first add the server-side validation function described earlier. 接下来，将客户端验证脚本函数添加到 ASP.NET ( .aspx) 页中。Next, add the client-side validation script function to the ASP.NET (.aspx) page. 如果使用 Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript) ，则该函数必须采用以下格式：If you are using Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript), the function must be in this form: ``` Sub ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` 如果你使用的是 JScript，则该函数必须采用以下格式：If you are using JScript, the function must be in this form: ``` function ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` `source`参数是对为 \ 控件呈现的元素的引用 。The `source` parameter is a reference to the \ element rendered for the control. 这允许你以编程方式控制 \ 标记，如修改 属性。This allows you to programmatically control the \ tag, such as modifying the attribute. `arguments`参数是具有两个属性： Value 和 IsValid 的对象。The `arguments` parameter is an object with two properties: Value and IsValid. 此参数允许你获取控件的值以便验证，并根据自定义验证例程指示该值是否有效。This parameter allows you to get the value of the control to validate and to indicate whether the value is valid based on your custom validation routine. 使用 属性指定与控件关联的客户端验证脚本函数的名称 。Use the property to specify the name of the client-side validation script function associated with the control. 由于脚本函数是在客户端上执行的，因此该函数必须采用目标浏览器支持的语言，如 VBScript 或 JScript。Because the script function is executed on the client, the function must be in a language that the target browser supports, such as VBScript or JScript. > [!NOTE] > 在 控件内使用控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅[部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 与服务器端验证一样，通过使用参数的属性访问要验证的输入控件中的字符串 `arguments` 。Like server-side validation, the string from the input control to validate is accessed by using the property of the `arguments` parameter. 通过设置参数的属性，返回验证的结果 `arguments` 。Return the result of the validation by setting the property of the `arguments` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 使用验证程序控件时，应始终检查服务器端验证的结果，然后再执行任何处理。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 在回发之后但在调用事件方法之前，页面调用验证程序控件并将其结果聚合到 属性中。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (你还可以使用方法显式调用验证程序控件 `Validate` 。 ) 在你自己的代码中，应检查属性是否在 `true` 处理输入之前返回。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使启用了脚本的浏览器可能会阻止在验证检查失败的情况下在客户端上发生回发，还应始终 在处理验证的数据之前签入服务器代码。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 多个验证控件可以与单个输入控件一起用于验证不同的条件。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，您可以对控件应用多个验证控件 ，使用户能够输入要添加到购物车中的项目的数量。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control that allows the user to enter the quantity of items to add to a shopping cart. 您可以使用 控件来确保指定的值小于库存量和 控件以确保用户在控件中输入值 。You can use a control to ensure that the value specified is less than the amount in inventory and a control to ensure that the user enters a value into the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果输入控件为空，则不会调用任何验证函数，验证将成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用 控件要求用户在输入控件中输入数据。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. 可以使用 控件而不设置 属性。It is possible to use a control without setting the property. 当验证多个输入控件或验证不能用于验证控件（如控件）的输入控件时，通常会执行此操作 。This is commonly done when you are validating multiple input controls or validating input controls that cannot be used with validation controls, such as the control. 在这种情况下， `arguments` 传递给事件的事件处理程序和客户端验证函数的参数的属性 始终包含空字符串 ( "" ) 。In this case, the property of the `arguments` parameter passed to the event handler for the event and to the client-side validation function always contains an empty string (""). 但是，在适当的情况下，仍会调用这些验证函数来确定服务器和客户端上的有效性。However, these validation functions are still called, where appropriate, to determine validity on both the server and client. 若要访问要验证的值，必须以编程方式引用要验证的输入控件，然后从相应的属性中检索值。To access the value to validate, you must programmatically reference the input control you want to validate and then retrieve the value from the appropriate property. 例如，若要验证 服务器上的控件，请不要设置 验证控件的属性，并为事件的处理程序使用以下代码 。For example, to validate a control on the server, do not set the property of the validation control and use the following code for the handler for the event. ```vb Sub ServerValidation (source As object, args As ServerValidateEventArgs) args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked = True) End Sub ``` ```csharp void ServerValidation (object source, ServerValidateEventArgs args) { args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked == true); } ``` 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建服务器端 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建客户端 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a client-side control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Adds the properties of the control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便 错误消息始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClientValidationFunction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ClientValidationFunction : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证的自定义客户端脚本函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the custom client-side script function used for validation.

value.span: 用于验证的自定义客户端脚本函数的名称。

span.span: The name of the custom client script function used for validation.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

para.span: 函数名不应包含任何括号或参数。

span.span: The function name should not include any parentheses or parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为执行客户端验证的函数的名称。Set this property to the name of the function that performs the client-side validation. 因为客户端验证函数在目标浏览器上运行，所以必须使用浏览器支持的脚本语言（如 JScript 或 VBScript）编写函数。Because the client validation function runs on the target browser, the function must be written using a scripting language supported by the browser, such as JScript or VBScript. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定执行客户端验证的函数的名称。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the function that performs client-side validation. 验证函数将检查偶数。The validation function checks for even numbers. 有关函数参数的说明，请参阅的 "备注" 部分 。For a description of the function parameters, see the Remarks section of . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 检查有效值的控件属性。

span.span: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.

returns.span: 如果控件属性有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终返回 visible 属性的值，前提 是该控件的属性 在页面上并且包含验证属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Function EvaluateIsValid () As Boolean

returns.span: 如果输入控件中的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

returns.span: 如果 参数指定的值通过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value specified by the parameter passes validation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 服务器上执行验证时，将引发事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为服务器端控件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerValidate As ServerValidateEventHandler

summary.span: 在服务器上执行验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when validation is performed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 服务器上执行验证时，将引发事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 此事件用于为输入控件（如控件）提供自定义验证例程 。This event is used to provide a custom validation routine for an input control, such as a control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为服务器端控件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. 它创建自定义验证例程，验证控件的值 是否为偶数，然后显示验证的结果。It creates a custom validation routine, validates the value of a control for an even number, and then displays the result of the validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateEmptyText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateEmptyText : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应该验证空文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether empty text should be validated.

value.span: 如果应该验证空文本，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if empty text should be validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个验证程序均可与目标控件相关联。Each validator can be associated with a targeted control. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，如果目标控件具有空字符串值（如 属性的值为 ），则验证程序 (除验证程序外，验证程序 ) 不会计算目标控件，而只会返回验证通过。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, if the targeted control had an empty string value, such as a property having a value of , the validator (except for the validator) would not evaluate the targeted control and would simply return that the validation passed. 此 属性是 .NET Framework 版本2.0 的新属性。The property is new for the .NET Framework version 2.0. 如果 设置为 `true` ，则验证程序使用指定给控件) 的条件来计算控件的值 ( ，并返回验证结果。If is set to `true`, the validator evaluates the control's value (using the criteria specified to the control) and returns the validation results. 此属性允许开发人员评估控件的结果， 而不管目标控件的值如何。This property allows developers to evaluate the results of a control regardless of the value of the targeted control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).
